data.title: Douglas Murray: 'What I Mind Is the Lie That a Man Can Become a Woman'
data.meta_description: Neoconservative Author Douglas Murray Is Used to Harsh Criticism and Even Death Threats for Fiercely Challenging Liberal Discourse. In an Interview, He Lays Out His Controversial Stances on Israel, Feminism, Race, Transgender Issues and the LGBTQ Community â€“ to Which He Belongs
